lines.text: [repeated line]
I believe a man has gotta be king in his own ranch-type-style tract house.
So, you agree to start your great climb to success, your climb to the very top?
I'm ready to climb!
By starting at the very bottom?
Right down below the depths of the bottom, deep, lowest place where I am, I'll start.
I finally found someone who loves me for me, not that I'm the Tuttle heiress, but me, the elevator girl.
And now some scenes from next week's show, The Case of the Missing Kidney.
Quimby here.
You're out of breath, Quimby.
Yes, I, ah
[clears throat]
working late, long day.
Don't put me on, Quimby. You've had at least three scotches and you're winded from chasing your pretty secretary. But don't worry, Quimby, I'll ok her next raise.
I've always considered you, not only my boss, but a dandy friend, Mrs. Tuttle.
I want you to give this nut every impossible, dirty job there is.
How do you suppose I got to be the general manager of this great store? How?
How? How?
I'll tell you! I'll tell you!
Go ahead! Go ahead!
I will! I will!
[at the golf practice machine]
Here's your driver, Mr. President.
Thank you, Jackie.
You... oh, that was good.
Something you women would like? Ah, that is, um, could I show you something in shoes?
My feet, I hope.

[Fake laughs]
Oh, ho-ho-ho-ho-ho, that is good. Yes, the size and style?
Black Spring-O-Lators, size three.
The...
[pause]
size... three?
Three!
SIZE three?
Something the matter with your hearing aid?
Well, no, I could turn it up.
Your wife is on the phone.
Hang up!
Yes, sir.
What are you, crazy, lady?
Forgive me for saying this, but this boy has character, and I know what character is! I remember when I had it!
Hey you! I'm leaving *your* house!
That baboon of a boy has just about wrecked the good name of Tuttle.
I thought you said he had character.
But there's no place in business for a man of character. His sincerity could ruin the world!
Naturally, that's why we, the insincere, must be in charge.

Mr. Phiffier has worked as a delivery boy at Macy's, theater usher at the New York Paramount, caddy at the Lodgemont Country Club, a TV repairman in the Bronx, and Mr. Phiffier also attempted to become a mailman but failed the test.
How can anyone fail becoming a mailman?
Sloping shoulders. The bag kept slipping off.
Barbara is NOT doing fine. Barbara is in love with an imbecile.
And you, too, will do good work, but first you must get the FEEL of this great store.
Oh, I'll have no trouble with that. I have very sensitive fingertips.
[Trying to slip a small, open-toe shoe onto a large foot, Norman searches for a leading toe]
If I could just grab one of these, maybe the others'll follow.
Are you making improper advances to me?
My back is to ya, lady. My back is to ya.
By some chance, Mr. Phiffier, could you be stealing a TV set?
Me, stealing, Mr. Quimby? Oh, I'd never steal anything.
If I recollect correctly, Mr. Phiffier, you're supposed to be working in the mattress department today.
Oh, yeah, I AM working in the mattress department today.
Then what are you doing here?

Oh, well, I was just really trying to, uh, satisfy a charge customer, you see, sir. Uh, buh, a lady that wanted to see, on a mattress there, just, uh, just how good the TV set was, so I borrowed two ladders, and I put a surfboard on top of two ladders that I borrowed from the Hawaiian hooky hula department. I just wanted to satisfy a charge customer so I could be the greatest salesman just like you - you, who are my idol, Mr. Quimby. If I ever turn out to be as good as you, I shall really live and breathe the air of kings. Oh, if I could ever be like you, oh boy, there'd never be Death of a Salesman with me. I'd live on, if I ever... Mmm.
You can give me a wedding present if you'll please, please just disinherit me.
I see you on the television all the time. You look the same in person.
Boy, I've got a house so big I get lost going to the bathroom.
My carpets are three inches thick, and...
Three inches thick! Huh. You better not ever invite Mickey Rooney over. You'll never be able to find him.
Well, your secretary isn't here so I thought I'd barge right in?
